A truly excellent sequel from the series, all of the features are amazing and jaw dropping for it's time, to name a few, superb graphics, marvelous story telling, brilliant CO-OP and so many more. I've been playing Portal 2 since 2015, and I'm still to this day not bored of this masterpiece, even though the features on the console/PS3. (the platform I used to play Portal on) Now that I got a hold of a PC copy of Portal 2 I am amazed on how the community changed this game, mods, custom test chambers, ect. But it gets better, two words, Console Commands, I have tons of fun with this feature, and its hilarious when playing with mates. Overall, perfect game.

About forty-five minutes southeast of Thibodaux, Louisiana
Lived a man called Doc Millsap and his pretty wife Hannah
Well, they raised up a son that could eat up his weight in groceries
Named him after a man of the cloth
Called him Amos Moses, yeah
yeah its pretty good first game i got actually
Extremely fun single player, make sure you have trustworthy friends if you ever want to try co op without losing your mind

this game is honestly really great, tests arent as hard as it was in the first game! im kind of dumb so i used a walkthrough to get past like 4 levels

only thing i dislike about this game is SPOILER ALERT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
the aperture science place underground with the orange and blue and white stuff... idk why but it peeved me, it took way to long to solve some parts of it and i was honestly just suffering with potato glados as my only support..

 the game is still amazing though, would play it again but would probably give up at the aperture science place
Portales Y Portales Con Robots Parlantes 2

Much like the first game but with more to solve, and more sarcastic comments from glados. It's really cool revisiting old test chambers. The added lore is also amazing! There were a few puzzles that I got stuck on for a bit, so I had to take a break and come back to it. There's also no heartbreak or feelings of betrayal in this game.
Ja platinei modo solo, ainda vou ver um dia pra platinar modo coop com meu amigo, a história do game é bem foda, já vai fazer um tempo que era pra eu ter feito análise mas fds Portal 2 é bom pra kct
Hat alles, was auch schon Portal gut gemacht hat und bietet noch mehr! (Hauptspielzeit fließt in den Editor)

El mejor juego de puzles, acertijos y el mejor de su secuela:
Que puedo decir de portal 2.. JUEGAZOO, el mejor de su secuela sin duda
-Mas horas de diversion
-Profundidad del trama
-Buen juego coop en especial si lo juegos con amigos.
-Excelente historia.
-Nos hace encariñar con Glados
-Excelentes mecanicas
-Final de la historia.
-Excelente trama que te hara jugar mas
-Puedes crear tus mapas, etc.

The reason its called portal 2 is because of the TWO portals you get with the game, Valve DOUBLED the size of the original game and added a story which is cool for people that are causal gamers that have TWO many things to do because they just don't understand how good the SIGMA GAMER GRINDSET (SGG) is. This game shows you the way to enlightment and the ascension to places that are so profound that human languages can't describe the beauty of those places the only thing that comes close is the song third eye by the band tool. The game has the ability to make you into a demi god like hey zeus, Because you will have so much insight of the perceivable universe, The mass growth of knowledge that you will know is just breath taking. Im saying so much about a masterpiece like this that i forget to say that it helped my marriage, My wife hated me because i was a beta male which makes sense because my wife is so so so very very hot the reason she is, is because she is half Filipino and half latino. On a rainy day she told me that she and our TWO kids were going to leave me. My life was going down hill but she told me to stop being a beta cuck and be a man. She lefted me for dead, But by the grace of god this game changed my life around from being a beta to a god. Thank you god for this great game

Si disfrutaste el Portal 1 y quieres más Portal 2 es perfecto.
